title: Seasons
description: HardCover. Pub Date :2012-02-01 176 English Gecko Press A season is a subdivision of the year. marked by changes in weather. ecology. and hours of daylight. Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earths axis relative to the plane of revolution.This beautiful picture book let your baby know different seasons.
author: Blexbolex
